case.name: Close Quarters Combat (CQC)
case.description: Asking the target 'fighter' tag for advice for close-up fighting. Responses can be genuine advice, sarcasm, or even just admitting that they aren't good at CQC.

case.name: What makes a good mercenary?
case.description: Leonie is asking what others think would make a great mercenary. Expected positive response e.g. "Someone who will fight for others", expected negative responses "One who finds the best paying job"

case.name: Leone's Title
case.description: A follow up to her previous question about being a mercenary. She will suggest a random title for herself. You can respond with approval, disapproval, or a new suggestion. She stores the one she says out loud.

case.name: Seeing FE characters
case.description: Leonie sees a table full of Fire Emblem characters that AREN'T from 3 Houses (her home game - that has its own callout)

case.name: Seeing FE:3H characters
case.description: Leonie sees a table full of Fire Emblem 3 Houses characters and comments on it.

case.name: Boots & Socks
case.description: Leonie takes off both her boots and her socks at the same time. She later regrets skipping ahead.

case.name: Notice Teacher
case.description: Leone is asking the stripping target (a teacher) about themselves.

case.name: Notice Armor
case.description: Leone is asking the stripping target (wearing armor) about themselves.

case.name: Op Lost Notice Uniform
case.description: Leonie notices that the target has a non-military school uniform, and comments on it. If this triggers for a character with a military tag & school uniform, please let me know.

notes.note: throw cloth over chair? idk 4am brain
Higher priority than the specific lines so that she comments on multiple 3H people being there instead of only talking to one
Lower priority than the specific FE lines, so that she prefers talking to someone she knows vs thinking about a stranger
Rivalry (Trait) - Leonie increases in difficulty if there are 2+ alive males. Also triggers on game start if there are 4 males in game.
Notices Bernadetta from her school. The two aren't close, but are familiar (They have a B rank support)
Notices Bernadetta from her school. The two aren't close, but are familiar (They have a B rank support). Bernadetta is in War, Leonie isn't.
Confuses Monika with Monica aka Kronya.
Secretly triggers Rivalry trait early, making her harder for the whole game.
This is placeholder until she get a costume added. It shouldn't trigger under normal circumstances.

markers.marker: A marker used to advance dialogue when she is in After Finished stage.
Asking Amy Rose where she keeps her hammer (amy_seen_hammer >= 3)
Tracks how many times I've spotted Amy holding her hammer in a pose.
Responded to Amy's question about shopping.
Character specific. Has asked them about them wearing armor. This marker stops her repeatedly asking about it.
Has asked someone with the 'fighter' tag a question. Happens once per game to avoid repetitiveness.
Asked her first question about being a mercenary.
Character specific. Has asked them about them being a teacher. This marker stops her repeatedly asking about it.
It's Leonie's birthday, and she makes everyone aware of this fact in idle conversation.
After Gwen has pulled down the top half of her suit.
Talking to Hermione about her robe.
Responding to Hermione's exposition about Ron.
Talking to Hermione about her sweater.
Jura has asked a question about seduction.
Has taken notice of Chazz's duel disk, and is confused.
Counts how many times she has 'Finished'. Helps cut down on 'beginner' dialogue in repeat playthroughs.
Leonie is the first one to have visible chest.
Leonie has listened to Chazz explain Slifer Red.
Has spotted Jolyne saying the phrase 'Stone Free', and is confused.
Reacting to Lux running out of puns.
Responding to Lux's comment about Poppy (hero finder with a hammer).
Megumin mentioned explosion magic.
Used in dialogue where Meia targets Leonie and mentions her homeworld.
Has mentioned captain Jeralt, her former mentor. In the war outfit, this dialogue will be past tense only. Unlocks Hand Drawn Map if it's 10+ and you finish a game.
Has talked about her mercenary title ideas and named one. This marker stores that name for later reference.
Reacting to Miss Pauling stripping (stage 0). Comment is about her outfit in general.
A per-target nickname she assignes to someone. This persists between games, so she always remembers it and doesn't need to ask again.
Leonie comments on the fact that there's only one male (the player).
A beginner comment, part 1.
A beginner comment, part 2.
While in Rivalry mode, making comments while masturbating.
Leonie confesses to masturbating while in the monastery sauna once.
Has spotted someone else with the 'fighter' tag. She will ask follow up questions after thinking to herself.
Smalltalk with a Ghost npc (e.g. Polly, Spooky). Only triggers once per game regardless of how many ghosts there are.
Responding to Meia saying her home world has no men when Leonie is stripping her jacker.
Talks about throwing clothes over a chair that might not be there. Just some dialogue.
Special trait. Triggered against male-heavy tables. Increases AI to 'Good' when set, and gives her more competitive dialogue. Also lets the player unlock the Crude Arrowheads.
